name: Grilled Chicken Burgers

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Organic Mustard

preparation: Using Piano Wire Whisk, whisk egg with water, then whisk in seasoning and mustard.
Crumble in chicken and sprinkle with breadcrumbs. Mix to combine. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 6 patties, or use a burger press.

Grill patties on the barbecue over medium-high heat with lid closed for 5 min. Flip and continue grilling for approximately 5 more min, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 160° F.
tips: Flavour Changer: try prepared Epicure Roasted Garlic Aioli instead of Honey or Sweet & Spicy Mustard.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Piano Wire Whisk
summary: Whisking and whipping made easy with the Piano Wire Whisk.
